channel.title: Runix-World - Dare you? ll Vps Hosted ll Webclient ll vBulletin Forums ll Profes
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2iwa5ns.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ettau0.png[/img] [URL=http://"www.runix-world.com/forum"]Facebook[/URL] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9h3klt.png[/img] [URL=http://"www.runix-world.com/register.php"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/syb05g.png[/img] [URL=http://"www.runix-world.com"]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20mtxc.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.runix-world.com/version2/game.html"]Play now[/URL]
[font=times new roman][size=14pt]Why should you join Runix-World.com?[/size][/font] You should join Runix-World mainly because we try to listen to our members, We try our best to make the game like they want. We are open for negative or positive feedback and respect your opinion. Beside this we also do our best to creat a stable economy and update the server alot.
[font=times new roman][size=14pt]Features[/size][/font]
* Vote4Cash * Highscores (coming soon). * Perfect switching * Alot of Mini-Games * Alot of Bosses * Ancient Curses * Fully working Ancients * Perfect working clan chat * Perfect stable leveling * 99% uptime guaranteed * Alot of skills working * Professional staff * Professional Management
[font=times new roman][size=14pt]Server Media[/size][/font]
teleports: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2pqjf4m.jpg[/img]
shops: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/303k0eo.jpg[/img]
Starter Package: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/j5kwlf.png[/img]
Curses: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/21kgo6f.png[/img]
Chaotic Maul: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ayvfcw.png[/img]
Chaotic maul: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/119o2sp.png[/img]
Berserker: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5ac85.png[/img]
Rapier hit: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yv11c0.png[/img]
Magic hit: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2aaj5us.png[/img]
Armadyl godsword special: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34nlbi9.png[/img]
Thanks for reading, hope to see you on Runix-World.com!
[/CENTER]

[font=times new roman][size=14pt]Why should you join Runix-World.com?[/size][/font]
You should join Runix-World mainly because we try to listen to our members, We try our best to make the game like they want. We are open for negative or positive feedback and respect your opinion. Beside this we also do our best to creat a stable economy and update the server alot.
